Donate

We need your help.

The Blockchain Education Network (College Cryptocurrency network) is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization. Your donations help us fund operations, programs, and financial aid for students interested in learning about blockchain. Donations to BEN are tax deductible.

Send us an email after you've made your donation and we will add you to a special newsletter for our supporters. We will respect your privacy and those who wish to remain anonymous.

Claiming a tax deduction: Please contact BEN at donations@blockchainedu.org for donation receipts and any additional questions you may have.
